Hero.title: PadelO₂
Hero.subtitle: Innovative padel ecosystem combining tournaments, training, AI-powered machines, and global court construction

1969.title: The Birth of Padel
1969.description: Padel was invented in Acapulco, Mexico by Enrique Corcuera. The first court was built in his home.

1990s.title: European Expansion
1990s.description: Padel spread across Spain and began gaining popularity in Europe, establishing itself as a competitive sport.

2010s.title: Global Recognition
2010s.description: Padel became one of the fastest-growing sports worldwide, with professional tournaments and international federations.

2025.title: PadelO₂ Innovation
2025.description: Introduction of AI-powered training machines, IoT-connected courts, and global investment opportunities.

future.title: The Future of Padel
future.description: PadelO₂ leads the transformation of padel through technology, sustainability, and global community building.

Investments.title: Joint Investments
Investments.headline: Build the Future of Padel with Us
Investments.subhead: Co-invest in courts, AI, and global expansion
Investments.body: PadelO₂ opens partnership models for investors and clubs: court installation under club revenue, participation in AI machines (rental/subscription), joint local networks. We provide technology, brand, and operational standards; partners provide locations and market. Revenue models depend on format and region.
Investments.note: Note: profitability indicators depend on country, traffic, and venue costs; financial model provided after brief.

Academy.title: Padel Academy
Academy.headline: Train Champions, Build Community
Academy.description: Comprehensive training programs for coaches and players, powered by AI and smart technology.
Academy.body: PadelO₂ Academy offers world-class training programs for coaches and players at all levels. Our curriculum combines traditional padel techniques with cutting-edge AI technology, creating a unique learning experience that adapts to each individual's needs.

coach.title: Coach Training
coach.description: Professional certification programs for padel coaches with advanced teaching methodologies. Learn from industry experts and get certified to train players at all levels.

player.title: Player Development
player.description: Personalized training programs designed to improve technique, strategy, and performance. Track your progress with AI-powered analytics and personalized feedback.

smart.title: Smart Training
smart.description: IoT-connected training machines with AI analysis and real-time performance tracking. Train smarter with data-driven insights and adaptive training programs.

Machines.title: AI-Powered Training Machines
Machines.headline: Train with Intelligence
Machines.subhead: IoT-connected padel machines with real-time AI coaching
Machines.body: Our machines don't just serve balls — they learn. Hundreds of scenarios tailored to your goal: pace, direction, spin, 'smart' series targeting specific weaknesses. AI tracks your technique, adjusts exercises, and progresses with you. Control from the app: player profiles, 'virtual coach', session reports, and pre-match recommendations.

virtualCoach.title: Virtual Coach
virtualCoach.description: Voice prompts synchronized with breathing rhythm

About.title: About PadelO₂
About.headline: Breathe and Live
About.subhead: A multi-language platform for the global padel ecosystem
About.body: PadelO₂ is a brand that unites competitions, training, and technology. We build courts, produce AI training machines, develop the Academy, and create investment opportunities for padel growth worldwide. Our products speak different languages and support local communities.
About.mission: Our mission is to showcase the history, growth, and future of padel visually and interactively, so every player 'breathes' the game.

ecosystem.title: Complete Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: AI-Machines + Academy + Courts + Investments — all in one

Courts.title: Padel Courts
Courts.headline: Courts that Breathe Performance
Courts.subhead: Indoor, outdoor, panoramic, and mobile — engineered and delivered
Courts.body: We design and build world-class courts: foundations, wind loads, acoustics, lighting, and certified glass. Panoramic solutions for clubs and media shoots, mobile ones for pop-up events. Full cycle: site survey → design → production → installation → service.

Partners.title: Our Partners
Partners.headline: Grow Together in the Padel Ecosystem
Partners.description: Join a network of leading companies and organizations in the padel ecosystem.
Partners.body: PadelO₂ partners with forward-thinking companies, clubs, and investors to expand the global padel community. We offer various partnership models tailored to your business needs, from brand collaborations to joint ventures and technology licensing.

visibility.title: Brand Visibility
visibility.description: Increase your brand exposure in the growing padel market through co-marketing and event partnerships

roi.title: ROI Opportunities
roi.description: Access profitable investment opportunities in padel infrastructure, technology, and global expansion

marketing.title: Co-Marketing
marketing.description: Collaborate on marketing campaigns, tournaments, and events to reach wider audiences

technology.title: Technology Access
technology.description: Leverage our AI-powered training machines, court management systems, and digital platforms

network.title: Global Network
network.description: Connect with padel communities, clubs, and players worldwide through our ecosystem

Tournaments.title: Tournaments
Tournaments.headline: Compete at the Highest Level
Tournaments.subhead: Join professional and amateur padel tournaments worldwide
Tournaments.description: Discover upcoming padel tournaments and register to compete.
Tournaments.body: PadelO₂ organizes and supports tournaments at all levels, from local club competitions to international championships. Whether you're a professional player or a passionate amateur, find the perfect tournament to showcase your skills and connect with the padel community.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Name
form.error: Error sending message. Please try again.

WhatsApp.message: Hello! I'm interested in learning more about your padel services.
